original_text: We have heard that some men from our group have confused your thoughts. These men came to you and they taught you without our authority. The things that they said were not right and they have upset you.
korean_text: 들은즉 우리 가운데서 어떤 사람들이 우리의 지시도 없이 나가서 말로 너희를 괴롭게 하고 마음을 혼란하게 한다 하기로

sentences.original_text: We have heard that some men from our group

sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 생각을 혼란스럽게 했다는 것을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and they taught you without our authority.
The things that they said were not right
